wipe_handle.description: Clean the handle to ensure proper aesthetic appeal and functionality.

slide_in_lid.description: Slide in the lid to secure the USB drive.

slide_out_lid.description: Slide out the lid to expose the USB plug.

wipe_usb_body.description: Clean the USB body to remove dust particles.

clean_whole_usb.description: Clean the entire USB including the handle, lid, and body.

prepare_usb_for_use.description: Get the USB ready for use by sliding out the lid and rotating the handle.
